headline: Walmart’s Stablecoin Ambitions Shake Up Payment Stocks
summary: Walmart Inc. (NYSE:WMT) is one of the best dividend stocks for a bear market. The company is reportedly looking into the idea of creating or using its own stablecoins. These digital tokens allow the transfer of US dollar value through cryptocurrency networks rather than traditional banking systems. For retailers, stablecoins are attractive because they could […]
